pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Argentine Economic, Social, and Geopolitical Data via RESTful APIs and Curated Datasets // Provides functions to access data from the 'ArgentinaDatos API' and the 'REST Countries API' related to Argentina's exchange rates, inflation, political figures, holidays, and general country- level indicators. Additionally, the package includes curated datasets related to Argentina, covering topics such as economic indicators, biodiversity, agriculture, human rights, genetic data, and consumer prices. The package supports research and analysis focused on Argentina by integrating open APIs with high-quality datasets from various domains. For more details on the 'ArgentinaDatos API', see https://argentinadatos.com/ and for 'REST Countries', see https://restcountries.com/.
